title: What I Learned about SRAM Red XPLR 1×13 after a 500km DNF
content:
I only managed 330 km but I still had plenty of time to think about the performance of the SRAM RED XPLR 1x13 and Zipp 303 XPLR SW wheels.

Read the full article at What I Learned about SRAM Red XPLR 1×13 after a 500km DNF on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
